title: Turning Back the Clock: The 1951 Bell Manual for Operating a Rotary Telepho
excerpt: In 1951, Bell Telephone System introduced a guide titled "The Telephone and How We Use It," designed to aid elementary school students and others in understanding the operation of classic rotary dial phones. title: Want your customers to RTFM? Try building a better user manual
excerpt: For a cost-effective way to reduce expenses, boost retention and drive new revenues, bring your outdated user manuals into the digital era.
